name: tiny mystery showcase
description:
This is a tiny anthology I put together to show off the bare bones of my Tiny Adventure package, a little engine that combines some pathfinding with a touch of simple inventory system and usually, hooks into the Yarn system. 

I've also thrown in my 2D game art and sprites, some 3D modelling, some playing with toon shaders, the absolute bare bones of escape-the-room-point-and-click adventure design.

Your speakers aren't broken, there is no sound in this game. Hit ESC to bring up options, controls, or return to the main menu. Tell me about any bugs, it's not embarrassing, it's helpful!
